name: opencga_data_upload
title: opencga_data_upload
summary: This app takes VCFs from DNAnexus and uploads, indexes and annotates them into a particular OpenCGA study

inputSpec.name: input_vcf
inputSpec.label: Path to VCF to be uploaded

inputSpec.name: input_metadata
inputSpec.label: Metadata File
inputSpec.help: Input metadata file with, at least, the OpenCGA study id. Further metadata specifications can be reflected in this file

inputSpec.name: credentials
inputSpec.label: credentials File
inputSpec.help: Credentials file containing the necessary parameters to run this app

outputSpec.name: output_file
outputSpec.label: Output File
outputSpec.help: One or more vcf files to be uploaded by opencga
